Metadata.name: High Quality Party Portraits
Metadata.author: Joenator
Metadata.description:
Replaces the party portraits used during dungeon exploration with the higher-quality portraits used during battles.
Disable Persona 3 The Movie Portraits if you would like to use the default portraits at all times.
If you use this mod and Persona 3 The Movie Portraits together, the default character portraits will display during dungeon exploration and the P3 movie portraits will display during battle.
